title: Clean Mouth, Gums & Breath Organic Herbal Remedy - Earth Animal
author: Name
cleaned_text: Where & How They're Made Since 2002, Dr. Bob Goldstein has worked with master herbalist Kristy Haley of Crystal Garden Herbs in Bethel, VT to capture the ancient medicinal power of wild crafted herbs for true holistic healing. After selecting the most beneficial herbs and mixing them with flower essences, the blends soak for over 30 days, and are then hand extracted and poured into a light sensitive tincture, crafting a remedy that addresses conditions dogs and cats suffer from day to day.
